name: Scaldwater Bay
description:
Scaldwater Bay constitutes another of the old “Treaty Ports” hugging the spits and deltas of the western shore of the Morathi Sea. 

The port maintains a tentative connection to the relict government across the narrow sea, and pays at least lip service fealty to the Prince Regent who now holds sway on the eastern shore. The tiny port links to settlements and a few other redoubts along the rough trade road that holds its own along the coastline in these parts.

A small coastal frontier settlement with a number of NPCs, a tavern, and a few seeds for OSR sandbox adventure.
